title: 242: Activating Your Brainpower with Ian Clark
description:
How do you activate your brainpower?

Talking about quality brain nutrients can be daunting for many people. There is a lot of information in the world, so how can you start looking for the essential nutrients to fuel your body and mind?

I’m excited to have my long-time friend and a wellness sage, Ian Clark, on the show today. He is the founder of Activation Products, which supplies high-quality wellness products around the world.

The most important thing about brain nutrients is knowing what you’re putting in your body. This means researching products and always consulting with your health practitioner before making any drastic changes.

Not getting enough nutrients can lead to mental fatigue, stress, and brain fog. If you’ve ever wondered how to start looking for quality nutrients that will truly fuel both your body and brain, this episode is for you.

Get a 20% discount today by using the code: kwik20 http://activationproducts.com/kwik 

*** Do you want to stay up to date with every new episode and get my brand new Kwik Brain Accelerator Program? Go to www.KwikBrain.com/podcast to get instant access. ***
